title: Death Ring (Part 1)
body:
Death Ring (Part 1)

"Phantom Shot"

---) Phantom Shot: Shots fired from the Carnage can phase through obstacles, allowing you to take down enemies who think they are safe behind cover. (Can only be used three times a day)

Bang!

The sound of a gunshot rang out and the bullet made of Palluto shot towards the A+ rank spider who was thirty kilometres away from him.

The bullet travelled at the speed of light and phased through some trees that came into its path.

Puchi!

The A+ rank spider didn't even get time to react before the bullet pierced its head and the violent power inside it ravaged its internal organs.

The eyes of the spider that were glowing suddenly dimmed down and its body dropped to the ground, lifeless.

"Perfect Headshot!" Evan said and put away Carnage.

Shriek!

Evan heard angry and fearful shrieks of the other high ranking spiders when he killed another A+ rank spider.
